variant.summary: Caption annotations from the description engine

variant.summary: Label annotations from the description engine

variant.summary: OCR (text extraction) annotations from the description engine

variant.name: DescUnknown.
variant.summary: Annotations of an unknown type from the description engine

variant.name: Ocr.
variant.summary: OCR (text extraction) annotations from the specialized OCR engine

variant.name: .BestEffort
variant.summary: LRU cache strategy.

variant.name: .HoldUntilExpired
variant.summary: Hold the cache file until expired.

variant.name: .AssistantDetails
variant.summary: Showing cache patterns only for AssistantDetails.

variant.name: .AutofillCardArt
variant.summary: Show customized card-art image for credit card suggestions on Android.

variant.name: .AutofillImageFetcher
variant.summary: Show customized card art image for credit card.

variant.name: .ContextualSuggestions

variant.name: .Cryptids
variant.summary: Asset fetcher for cryptid rendering.

variant.name: .EduAccountLoginProfileImageFetcher
variant.summary: Profile image fetcher for EDU account login flow

variant.name: .EntitySuggestions
variant.summary: Showing cache patterns only for EntitySuggestions.

variant.name: .FedCMAccountChooser
variant.summary: Profile image fetcher for FedCM Account chooser.

variant.name: .Feed
variant.summary: Showing cache patterns only for Feed.

variant.name: .Internal
variant.summary: Showing cache patterns only for Internal.

variant.name: .LightweightReactions
variant.summary: Thumbnails and GIFs fetched for the Lightweight Reactions feature.

variant.name: .NewTabPageAnimatedLogo
variant.summary: Showing cache patterns only for NewTabPageAnimatedLogo.

variant.name: .OfflinePages
variant.summary: Showing cache patterns only for OfflinePages.

variant.name: .PriceDropNotification
variant.summary: Images fetched for the icon of price drop notification.

variant.name: .QueryTiles
variant.summary: Showing Query tiles images.

variant.name: .SharePreview
variant.summary: Images fetched for Share previews.

variant.name: .VideoTutorialsIPH
variant.summary: Showing thumbnails for video tutorials IPH.

variant.name: .VideoTutorialsList
variant.summary: Showing thumbnails for video tutorials list view.

variant.name: .WebNotes
variant.summary: Images fetched and used to render Web Notes templates.

histogram.name: Image.ResampleMS
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Time it takes to do high-quality image resampling for images that are resized. Non-resized images and ones our heuristic decides can be done "badly" are not counted.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.CacheHit
histogram.summary: For each image processed by the image annotation service, records whether or not results for the image already existed in the client-side cache. A hit means that image data was not transmitted to the image annotation server.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ClientResult
histogram.summary: For each request made by a client feature to the image annotation service, reports the final status of the service response.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.DescType
histogram.summary: For each annotation backend run by the image annotation server, records the gRPC status reported.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.EncodedJpegSizeKB
histogram.summary: For each image sent from a client feature to the image annotation service, reports the image's final size (in kilobytes) after resizing and reencoding.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.EngineKnown
histogram.summary: For each annotation backend run by the image annotation server, records whether or not the backend is recognised by this version of Chrome.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ImageRequestIncludesDesc
histogram.summary:
For each image request sent to the image annotation server, records whether or not the description backend is included among the requested backends.
The description backend will not be included when the image is known to violate the description model policy (i.e. be too small or have too-high an aspect ratio).

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ImageRequestIncludesIcon
histogram.summary:
For each image request sent to the image annotation server, records whether or not the icon backend is included among the requested backends.
The icon backend will not be included when the image is known to violate the icon model policy (i.e. be too large or have too-high an aspect ratio).

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.JsonParseSuccess
histogram.summary: For each non-empty response sent from the image annotation server, records whether or not JSON data were successfully parsed from the response body.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.PixelFetchSuccess
histogram.summary: For each pixel fetch request sent from the image annotation service to a client feature, records whether or not encoded pixel data were successfully returned to the service.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ServerHttpResponseCode
histogram.summary: For each HTTP response from the image annotation server, reports the associated HTTP code.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ServerLatencyMs
histogram.summary: For each HTTP response from the image annotation server, reports the time elapsed (in milliseconds) since the corresponding request was sent.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ServerNetError
histogram.summary: For each HTTP request sent to the image annotation server, reports the net error (or OK status) of the request.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ServerRequestSizeKB
histogram.summary: For each HTTP request sent to the image annotation server, reports the size of the request. Measured in kilobytes, since a request can contain the pixel data of multiple images.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ServerResponseSizeBytes
histogram.summary: For each HTTP response from the image annotation server, reports the response size in bytes.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.SourcePixelCount
histogram.summary: For each image sent from a client feature to the image annotation service, reports the image's original (i.e. pre-scaling) area in pixels. Images with pixel count above a certain threshold will be resized prior to transmission.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.{ImageAnnotationServiceAnnotationType}AccessibilityV1.Confidence
ImageAnnotationService.{ImageAnnotationServiceAnnotationType}AccessibilityV1.Empty
histogram.summary: For each annotation of the given type returned by the image annotation server, records whether or not the text of the annotation was empty. This is sometimes valid, e.g. for text extraction (OCR) on an image that does not contain any text. {ImageAnnotationServiceAnnotationType}

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.{ImageAnnotationServiceAnnotationType}AccessibilityV1.Status
histogram.summary: For each annotation backend run by the image annotation server, records the gRPC status reported. {ImageAnnotationServiceAnnotationType}

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.CacheMetadataCount{ImageFetcherCacheStrategy}
ImageFetcher.CacheSize{ImageFetcherCacheStrategy}
histogram.summary: The total size of the cache for a given cache strategy. Recorded during cache eviction process. {ImageFetcherCacheStrategy}

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.Events{ImageFetcherClients}
ImageFetcher.ImageLoadFromCacheTimeJava{ImageFetcherClients}
histogram.summary: The time it takes for cached_image_fetcher to load an image from the cache in Java. {ImageFetcherClients}

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.ImageLoadFromCacheTime{ImageFetcherClients}
histogram.summary: The time it takes for cached_image_fetcher to load an image from the cache in native. {ImageFetcherClients}

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.ImageLoadFromNativeTimeJava{ImageFetcherClients}
histogram.summary: The time it takes for cached_image_fetcher to load an image from native code. Only recorded on successful loads. {ImageFetcherClients}

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.ImageLoadFromNetworkAfterCacheHit{ImageFetcherClients}
histogram.summary: The time it takes for cached_image_fetcher to load an image from the network after a cache hit. {ImageFetcherClients}

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.ImageLoadFromNetworkTime{ImageFetcherClients}
histogram.summary: The time it takes for cached_image_fetcher to load an image from the network. {ImageFetcherClients}

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.LoadImageMetadata
histogram.summary: The time it takes to load an image's metadata from the metadata store.

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.RequestStatusCode{ImageFetcherClients}
ImageFetcher.TimeSinceLastCacheLRUEviction
histogram.summary: The time since the last LRU eviction from the image cache. Recorded when two LRU evictions occur within closure proximity to one another. Will be used to determine if LRU eviction is happening too frequently.

histogram.name: ImageLoader.Client.Cache.HitMiss
histogram.summary: For each image load request that requested caching, records whether or not it was found in the client-side cache. A hit means the request was not forwarded to the ImageLoader extension.

histogram.name: ImageLoader.Client.Cache.Usage
histogram.summary: Returns the percentage of the client-side cache that is used for loading images, before they are sent to the ImageLoader extension. Expressed as a percentage of ImageLoaderClient.CACHE_MEMORY_LIMIT (e.g. 20MB).

histogram.name: ImageLoader.Client.Cached
histogram.summary: For each image load request records whether or not it requested caching.
